params._externalSalt: External salt for deterministic address generation
params._owner: Address that will own the contract

create(address,bytes,address,uint32,byte.details: This method is primarily used by SiloDeployer to create the oracle during deployment

params._externalSalt: External salt for deterministic address generation
params._owner: Address that will own the contract
params._underlyingOracleFactory: Factory address to create the underlying oracle
params._underlyingOracleInitData: Calldata to call the factory and create the underlying oracle

params._deployer: Address of the account that will deploy the oracle
params._externalSalt: External salt for the CREATE2 deterministic deployment

returns.predictedAddress: The address where the ManageableOracle would be deployed

ORACLE_IMPLEMENTATION().notice: Get the implementation contract that will be cloned

create(address,bytes,address,uint32,byte.notice: Create a new ManageableOracle with underlying oracle factory

predictAddress(address,bytes32).notice: Predict the deterministic address of a ManageableOracle that would be created
